MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  We are arranging to have engineers investigate the fault, and we hope to have your electricity restored by 04-NOV-2020 17:45.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the L15  postcode area of Liverpool, affecting properties in Strathcona Road, Macdonald Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2.43pm. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5.45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4.41pm on 4th of Nov 2020.
